TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripDropDownItemAccessibleObject extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripItem/ToolStripItemAccessibleObject

summary.span: 提供可及性應用程式為殘障使用者調整 的使用者介面時所使用的資訊。

span.span: Provides information that accessibility applications use to adjust the user interface of a for users with impairments.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripDropDownItem item) cil managed

summary.span: 使用指定的 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified .

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void DoDefaultAction() cil managed

summary.span: 執行與這個可存取物件相關的預設動作。

span.span: Performs the default action associated with this accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 用戶端可以藉由檢查物件的擷取物件的預設動作屬性。Clients can retrieve the object's default action by inspecting an object's property. 用戶端可使用自動化 （如果支援） 而不是以執行物件的預設動作。A client can use automation (if supported) instead of to perform an object's default action. 不過，可讓您輕鬆地執行物件的最常用的動作。However, provides an easy way to perform an object's most commonly used action.

para.span: 系統提供的使用者介面項目所執行之預設動作取決於鍵盤的狀態。

span.span: The default action performed by system-provided user interface elements depends on the keyboard state.

para.span: 也就是說，如果輔助按鍵，例如 SHIFT、 ALT 或 CTRL 已關機 （無論是由使用者動作或以程式設計方式） 時呼叫時，預設值動作可能不是當這些索引鍵不是向下相同。

span.span: That is, if a modifier key such as SHIFT, ALT, or CTRL is down (either by a user action or programmatically) when is called, the default action might not be the same as when those keys are not down.

para.span: 並非所有的物件都有預設動作。

span.span: Not all objects have a default action.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject GetChild(int32 index) cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetChild (index As Integer) As AccessibleObject

param.name: index
param.span: 可存取子控制項之以零起始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index of the accessible child control.

summary.span: 擷取與指定之索引相對應的可存取子控制項。

span.span: Retrieves the accessible child control corresponding to the specified index.

returns.span: ，表示與指定之索引相對應的可存取子控制項。

span.span: An that represents the accessible child control corresponding to the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from , is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不會不含任何內建的可存取資訊。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Therefore, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼示範如何覆寫方法。This code demonstrates overriding the method. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#4)]

span.span: Retrieves the number of children belonging to an accessible object.

returns.span: 屬於可存取物件的子系數目。

span.span: The number of children belonging to an accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立可存取性感知的圖表控制，請使用和類別會公開可存取的資訊。The following code example demonstrates the creation of an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 控制項會繪製兩條曲線，以及一個圖例。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別，衍生自，用於方法以提供圖表控制項的自訂存取資訊。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from , is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因為圖表圖例不是實際-為基礎的控制，但改為繪製所 chart 控制項中，它不會不含任何內建的可存取資訊。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`類別覆寫方法以傳回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示每個部分的圖例可存取的資訊。Therefore, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 當存取感知的應用程式使用這個控制項時，控制項可以提供必要的可存取資訊。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此程式碼示範如何覆寫顯示方法。This code demonstrates shows overriding the method. 請參閱類別概觀的完整程式碼範例。See the class overview for the complete code example. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#4)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#4)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#4)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overrides ReadOnly Property Role As AccessibleRole
public: virtual property System::Windows::Forms::AccessibleRole Role { System::Windows::Forms::AccessibleRole get(); };

summary.span: 取得這個可存取之物件的角色。

span.span: Gets the role of this accessible object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件的角色，可協助說明物件的函數。The role of the object helps describe the function of the object.
